name: malonyl-CoA:malonyl-CoA C-acyltransferase (decarboxylating, methylating, 2-methylbutanoate-forming)
definition: 2 Malonyl-CoA + Acyl-carrier protein + 2 NADPH + 2 H+ + S-Adenosyl-L-methionine <=> (S)-2-Methylbutanoyl-[acp] + 2 CoA + 2 CO2 + 2 NADP+ + S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + H2O
comment: Acy-carrier protein is acp domain of the enzyme itself [KO:K20984].
